original_text: But the more they were oppressed, the more they multiplied and spread; so the Egyptians came to dread the Israelites
korean_text: 그러나 학대를 받을수록 더욱 번성하여 퍼져나가니 애굽 사람이 이스라엘 자손으로 말미암아 근심하여

sentences.original_text: But the more they were oppressed
the more they multiplied and spread
so the Egyptians came to dread
